channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 1:41 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community
item.description: 🟡 1:41 p.m. The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyan district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchan territorial community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 1:39 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291
